name: Mori (itch)
description:
A little child is held in a box by its parents to prevent those unknown beings which they fear so much from getting in contact with their most beloved. But the other side of the coin reveals a world in shadows and Mori's turn to decide..







--



Music is made by Jule Baetz


Sounds are mostly spoken by Marie Schomerus, a few by myself


Credits to Haxe for creating a wonderful language and Haxepunk for porting the supercool framework Flashpunk.


Code can be found @ Github


--

ESCAPE . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Menu

F1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Fullscreen toggle



--


"Little boy wanderer. Trapped in a box for who-knows-how-long, this child has been protected from the dark shapes and scary sights of his world..."

- Rock, Paper, Shotgun
